name: Speedrunner Cube
description:
This is game is all about speed and timing!!!

You are going to be speed running cube that JOINED TOGETHER cursor for movement

There are 15 Levels in this game and they are also unique 

There are many Obstacle but the cube have fate with you and can you do it???

Play it now for free!!!

Tutorial:

Movement = Mouse

and that's all

Note:

This game is made for GMTK Game Jam 2021 and I wasted one and half a day in doing three ideas with didn't work!!

I did this game in 12 hours!!!

Thanks for playing the game and have a nice day

- Spider Developer from Random Ideation Studios
